import{useCallback}from'react';import{useAddPopup}from'../state/application/hooks';var DEFAULT_ERROR_MSG='Unexpected error is occurred.';function useCatchError(){var addPopup=useAddPopup();return useCallback(function(promise){var message=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:DEFAULT_ERROR_MSG;promise.catch(function(err){if(err.message.includes('User denied')){// User denied transaction signature on MetaMask.
return;}console.error("Uncaught exception: ".concat(err.stack));addPopup({error:{message:message,stack:err.stack}});});},[addPopup]);}export default useCatchError;
